Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and quality, it's truly a remarkable investment. I believe in its value and am confident it will serve you well. Considering its worth, I propose a special introductory price of $150 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity to own this product at a slightly higher value than what most others might pay, reflecting its unique benefits and your early adoption. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this offer further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
